testcase.name: shouldQueueCommandsEvenWhenNotRunning
testcase.system-out: ✓ [KEYBOARD → QUEUE] Added to keyboard queue: W_MOVEMENT_UP

testcase.name: shouldHandleJumpCommands
testcase.system-out: ✓ [KEYBOARD → QUEUE] Added to keyboard queue: W_JUMP ✓ ClientCommandSender started for player: WHITE Server sender thread started for player: WHITE ✓ [QUEUE → SERVER] Sent to server for validation: W_JUMP Server sender thread interrupted Server sender thread stopped

testcase.name: shouldSendCommandsFromQueue
testcase.system-out: ✓ [KEYBOARD → QUEUE] Added to keyboard queue: W_MOVEMENT_UP ✓ ClientCommandSender started for player: WHITE Server sender thread started for player: WHITE ✓ [QUEUE → SERVER] Sent to server for validation: W_MOVEMENT_UP Server sender thread interrupted Server sender thread stopped
